title: 4 Bedroom House for Rent 2 Baths -  Morris Brandon / Georgia Tech
posting_body: Hey Georgia Tech Undergrads or Grads: 4 Bedroom House ready for move in.
(September 2022) MOVE IN
House is advertised for one full year, and up for renewal on annual increments.
If for Georgia Tech Student:
Lease will be between the landlord and one single main Georgia Tech Student tenant and the other 3 tenants will sublease to the single tenant.
Rent will be paid lump sum one time at the beginning of each month $2,800.
If for a family:
House in Morris Brandon Elementary District Rated 9 (Great Schools)
***One month rental and utilities deposit are required with Criminal search and Great Credit financial status.
Monthly Utility Bills are by the tenant.

Electric - gas - Water connections will remain in the owner's name (Tenant will pay the monthly consumption plus 5% transactional fee to the landlord in addition to the monthly rent) (Tenant will obtain and pay for his own Internet)
Maximum occupancy: 4 students
4 bedrooms with 3 LCD (2-32" and 1-40") wall hung TV's - 3 bedrooms on one level and 1 bedroom on second level
1 Living room with 50" TV wall hung
Kitchen with plenty of cabinets and 4 appliances (Microwave, dishwasher, fridge all stainless steel and white gas stove)
2 bathrooms with tubs
Electric Washer and Dryer
Hunter ceiling fan in every room
Outdoor deck with screened room and natural gas griddle
Garden backyard
Front porch
4 parking spots within the premise frontage
All wooden floors
Heat Pump AC
Intown in Underwood hills community (BUCKHEAD) Northwest Atlanta, about 1.5 miles from Morris Brandon and 3 miles from Georgia Tech.
Friendly neighborhood for college students with plenty of restaurants
Charming home with close proximity to downtown, midtown and major attractions
***House interior will be refreshed with new paint and exterior landscape refresh
